channel.title: Odin Programming Language
channel.description: Recent content on Odin Programming Language

item.title: Ols
item.description: Ols is a language server for Odin, and works on all the popular text editors.

item.title: EmberGen
item.description: JangaFX are the creators of the 3D animation software EmberGen written fully in Odin. <video autoplay loop muted class="showcase-preview"><source src="https://jangafx.com/Q12021Launch/Media_Organized/videos/EmberGen/Film/film-composite.mp4"></video>

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: How to download and install the Odin compiler. Both from source or from a binary release, along with a list of per-platform requirements.

item.title: Discord
item.description: Get live support and talk with other lovers of Odin on the Odin Discord.

item.title: Forum
item.description: Odin has its very own official self-hosted forum, great for categorized long-form discussion.

item.title: Internet Relay Chat
item.description: Talk about Odin on the venerable IRC protocol at the unofficial channel #odin on hackint.org.

item.title: Overview
item.description: An overview of the Odin programming language and its features.

item.description: Post about Odin on the unofficial subreddit.

item.title: Packages
item.description: Documentation for all the official packages part of the core and vendor library collections.

item.title: Examples
item.description: Examples of Odin Code.

item.title: Demo File
item.description: The original demonstration of the Odin in a single file, including numerous examples of concepts and features of the programming language.

item.title: Books [External]
item.description: Understanding the Odin Programming Language teaches both basic and advanced concepts. You’ll learn about procedures, manual memory management, parametric polymorphism, data-oriented design, and much more. A book written by Karl Zylinski.

item.title: Running Tests
item.description: A walkthrough of Odin’s test runner.
